title: I've Always Wanted to Try It
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Let’s see, first, please download this app on your phone.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>This one, right.... Alright, I’ve downloaded it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Okay! Now launch the app and take a picture with your camera! Get ready, Dia-senpai~, and cheese!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Wa-, Kasumi-san! You pointed the camera at me too suddenly! I hope I wasn’t making a weird expression....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>It’s fine. It’s a cute picture. Now, take your picture and do this and this and~.... there! What do you think?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I have cat ears in this picture....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Fufufu, not only can you put cat ears, but you can also add stickers or draw things on your picture, you know.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I see, so you can make your pictures cute this way, huh.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Yeah, it’s easy once you’ve learned it! So Kasumin is sure that you can make pictures you took with Rubyko cute in no time, Dia-senpai♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>H-, how did you know....!? Uuu, thank you very much.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
